author: Doug Bostrom
content:
For what it’s worth, here’s an advisory from the USCG, “INSPECTION GUIDANCE FOR SAIL RIGGING AND MASTS ON INSPECTED SAILING VESSELS,” which includes a fascinating (anonymized) case history for a particular vessel including encountering rot at at mast heel and how it was rectified.

A wealth of information. No deficit– just lack of application?
